Title: Requires certain agencies to employ a competitive class affirmative action officer or administrator
Summary: Requires agencies which employ 100 or more employees to employ a competitive class affirmative action officer or administrator.
LawCode: Add Art 2 Title A-1 §§13 & 13-a, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to requiring certain state agencies to employ a competitive class affirmative action officer or administrator
